items.title: Responsive Website Template
items.description: A modern responsive website template suitable for personal and business websites. Uses the latest HTML5 and CSS3 technologies to ensure excellent display on various devices.

items.title: Task Management App
items.description: A clean and efficient task management application that helps users organize their daily work and life. Supports task categorization, priority setting, deadline reminders, and more.

items.title: UI Component Library
items.description: A modern UI component library containing various commonly used interface elements. Consistent design style, easy to integrate into various web projects, improving development efficiency.

items.title: E-commerce Platform
items.description: A fully-featured e-commerce platform supporting product display, shopping cart, and payment functions. Uses a modern technology stack to provide a smooth user experience.

items.title: Weather Forecast App
items.description: A real-time weather forecast application providing current weather conditions and forecasts for the coming days. Supports multiple city switching and displays detailed information such as temperature, humidity, and wind speed.

items.title: Brand Design System
items.description: A complete brand system designed for a startup company, including logo, color scheme, font selection, and application guidelines. Established a consistent visual language.
